survey_name: Employee Well-being and Work-Life Balance Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee well-being and work-life balance within the organization to identify areas for improvement and ensure a healthy workplace environment.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response. Ensure the scale is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current work-life balance?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors most negatively impact your work-life balance? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections for a comprehensive understanding of challenges.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors most negatively impact your work-life balance? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional support or resources would help improve your work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional support or resources would help improve your work-life balance?

questions.question_text: How often do you feel stressed due to work-related issues?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point frequency scale for consistency and ease of analysis.

script.question_text: How often do you feel stressed due to work-related issues?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that your manager supports your well-being and work-life balance?
questions.client_notes: Include a neutral option to avoid forcing a positive or negative response.
